name: mcp-powerbi-finvision
description: A production-ready MCP server for Power BI Desktop analysis with DAX debugging, unified operations, and comprehensive model operations. Complete DAX optimization with structured JSON output for AI-friendly formatting!
long_description:
MCP-PowerBi-Finvision v6.4+ enables AI-powered analysis of Power BI models with 30 consolidated tools. Features include:

**Connection & Detection:**
- Auto-detect and connect to Power BI Desktop instances
- Automatic connection management

**Unified Operations (Complete CRUD):**
- Table operations: List, describe, preview, create, update, delete, rename, refresh
- Column operations: List, get, statistics, distribution, create, update, delete
- Measure operations: List, get (with DAX), create, update, delete, rename
- Relationship operations: List, get, find, create, update, delete
- Calculation group operations: List, list_items, create, delete
- Role operations: List security roles (RLS/OLS)

**DAX Intelligence (v6.4):**
- Complete DAX analysis with structured JSON output for AI-friendly formatting
- Comprehensive analysis: context transitions, anti-patterns, code improvements, VertiPaq metrics, call tree hierarchy
- Always provides production-ready optimized measures
- Automatic code transformation with actual DAX rewrites (not just suggestions)
- Debug DAX with step-by-step context transition analysis
- Web research integration for best practices (SQLBI and other sources)
- Smart measure finder with fuzzy matching
- Automatic syntax validation before analysis
- Before/after code comparison with detailed explanations

**Analysis Tools:**
- Simple analysis: Fast 8-operation overview (2-5s)
- Full analysis: Comprehensive BPA + performance + integrity (10-180s)
- Dependency and impact analysis
- PBIP repository analysis (offline)

**Hybrid Analysis (Advanced):**
- Export TMDL + metadata + sample data packages
- BI Expert analysis with concrete recommendations
- Pattern-based fuzzy search
- Token-optimized formats

**TMDL Management:**
- Export, find & replace, bulk rename, generate scripts
- Unified TMDL operations handler

**Documentation & Export:**
- Generate/update Word documentation
- Live model schema export
- Model comparison

**Advanced Features:**
- Batch operations (3-5x faster than individual operations)
- Transaction management with ACID support
- Token usage tracking
- User guide

Requirements:
- Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
- Power BI Desktop installed and running
- .NET Framework 4.7.2+

Everything runs locally over stdio with no exposed ports.

tools.name: 01_Detect_PBI_Instances
tools.description: [01_Connection] Detect running Power BI Desktop instances

tools.name: 01_Connect_To_Instance
tools.description: [01_Connection] Connect to Power BI Desktop (auto-detect or specify model_index)

tools.name: 04_Search_Objects
tools.description: [04_Query_Search] Search across tables, columns, and measures by name

tools.name: 05_Export_DAX_Measures
tools.description: [05_DAX_Intelligence] Export all DAX measures to CSV

tools.name: 05_Column_Usage_Mapping
tools.description: [05_DAX_Intelligence] Usage analysis for measures and columns

tools.name: 07_PBIP_Dependency_Analysis
tools.description: [07_PBIP_Analysis] Interactive dependency analysis with measure/column browser

tools.name: 07_Analyze_Aggregation
tools.description: [07_PBIP_Analysis] Analyze aggregation tables, measures, and visual usage

tools.name: 07_Analyze_Bookmarks
tools.description: [07_PBIP_Analysis] Analyze bookmarks with categories, complexity, and orphan detection

tools.name: 07_Analyze_Theme_Compliance
tools.description: [07_PBIP_Analysis] Analyze visual theme compliance with color/font validation

tools.name: 09_Debug_Visual
tools.description: [09_Debug] Visual debugger - discovers pages/visuals, shows filter context, executes queries

tools.name: 09_Compare_Measures
tools.description: [09_Debug] Compare original vs optimized measure with same filter context

tools.name: 09_Get_Visual_Filters
tools.description: [09_Debug] Get complete filter context for a visual

tools.name: 09_List_Slicers
tools.description: [09_Debug] List all slicers with their saved selections

tools.name: 09_Drill_To_Detail
tools.description: [09_Debug] Show underlying rows with filter context applied

tools.name: 09_Analyze_Measure
tools.description: [09_Debug] Analyze measure DAX, detect anti-patterns, and suggest fixes

tools.name: 09_Advanced_Analysis
tools.description: [09_Debug] Advanced: decompose, contribution, trend, root_cause, export
